org.corfudb.runtime.smr

Interface ICorfuDBObject<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDBSimpleMap

    public interface ICorfuDBObject<T>
extends Serializable
    Created by mwei on 5/1/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Object accessorHelper(ISMREngineCommand command)
      Must be called whenever the object is accessed, in order to ensure that every write is read.
      default ISMREngine getSMREngine()
      Returns the SMR engine associated with this object.
      UUID getStreamID()
      Get the UUID of the underlying stream
      default T getTransactionalContext(ITransaction tx)
      Gets a transactional context for this object.

      Get underlying SMR engine
      ITransaction getUnderlyingTransaction()
      Get the underlying transaction
      Class<?> getUnderlyingType()
      Get the type of the underlying object
      default boolean isAutomaticallyPlayedBack()
      Whether or not the object has been registered for automatic playback.
      default Object mutatorAccessorHelper(ISMREngineCommand command)
      Called whenever and object will be both mutated and accessed.
      default void mutatorHelper(ISMREngineCommand command)
      Called whenever an object is to be mutated with the command that will be executed.
      void setUnderlyingSMREngine(ISMREngine engine)
      Set underlying SMR engine

        ISMREngine getUnderlyingSMREngine()
        Get underlying SMR engine
        Returns:
        The SMR engine this object was instantiated under.

        Set underlying SMR engine
        Parameters:
        smrEngine - The SMR engine to replace.

      • getUnderlyingTransaction

        ITransaction getUnderlyingTransaction()
        Get the underlying transaction
        Returns:
        The transaction this object is currently participating in.

      • getTransactionalContext

        default T getTransactionalContext(ITransaction tx)
        Gets a transactional context for this object.
        Returns:
        A transactional context to be used during a transaction.

      • accessorHelper

        default Object accessorHelper(ISMREngineCommand command)
        Must be called whenever the object is accessed, in order to ensure that every write is read.

      • mutatorHelper

        default void mutatorHelper(ISMREngineCommand command)
        Called whenever an object is to be mutated with the command that will be executed.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be executed.

      • mutatorAccessorHelper

        default Object mutatorAccessorHelper(ISMREngineCommand command)
        Called whenever and object will be both mutated and accessed.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to be executed.
        Returns:
        The result of the access.

      • isAutomaticallyPlayedBack

        default boolean isAutomaticallyPlayedBack()
        Whether or not the object has been registered for automatic playback.
        Returns:
        True if the object is being automatically played back, False otherwise.
